body:
I have made some changes to cython_freeze and attached a patch series to bring it up to date.

At 2009-10-11T04:57:56Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0001-freeze-in-documentation-reference-Demos-freeze.hg](https://gist.github.com/2d55277465f5586c5a6b284095e83309)

At 2009-10-11T04:58:01Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0002-freeze-rename-cython_freeze.py-to-cython_freeze.hg](https://gist.github.com/96a3dfaaf51ec533d124911a8c355385)

At 2009-10-11T04:58:06Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0003-freeze-fix-Makefile-s-CYTHON-path.hg](https://gist.github.com/3bf4bc98d733f2e3473433ff174eecb1)

At 2009-10-11T04:58:11Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0004-freeze-fix-cmath.pyx-when-run-as-__main__.hg](https://gist.github.com/48f7acf0f59bdcbdab49de564b79713d)

At 2009-10-11T04:58:15Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0005-freeze-remove-mistaken-semicolon.hg](https://gist.github.com/8057c08b0efdfb3ee2e8740de47c26f2)

At 2009-10-11T04:58:21Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0006-freeze-Makefile-only-clean-specific-C-files.hg](https://gist.github.com/43bbb29e52659a63432ef753f2ed023c)

At 2009-10-11T04:58:26Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0007-freeze-README-fix-typos-and-mistakes-in-example.hg](https://gist.github.com/89379b43fd8de7ff04de8112c7f63271)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:13Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0008-freeze-Makefile-flags-from-distutils.sysconfig.patch](https://gist.github.com/72cbea0368eea23d21c5f94238f5eecc)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:23Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0009-freeze-use-optparse-to-parse-arguments.patch](https://gist.github.com/febfacdf5c116087119e3bc2e5c52ecb)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:28Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0010-freeze-add-o-option-for-setting-output-file.patch](https://gist.github.com/57ccfd11de86a0e806c09b190ad6b19b)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:33Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0011-freeze-remove-blank-lines-from-beginning-and-end.patch](https://gist.github.com/94530db63fcc5975b7850ddb3b7a3352)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:37Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0012-freeze-add-p-option-for-calling-Py_Main.patch](https://gist.github.com/60c16d2592b2e386ae3a3bc87587ff4f)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:42Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0013-freeze-add-pymain-example.patch](https://gist.github.com/e699d8a2fef3b82cf62526f99c7edd95)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:47Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0014-freeze-rename-README.rst-to-README.txt.patch](https://gist.github.com/12e0771496f38cadea97463d51c5167e)

At 2009-10-11T04:59:51Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0015-freeze-Makefile-add-target-to-build-README.html.patch](https://gist.github.com/9705b1629abc856a169925f30143d02c)

At 2009-10-11T05:04:55Z @MarkLodato added attachment [freeze-updates.tar.gz](https://gist.github.com/514ca86c305f6dfb4fe3f7c0c7a7fc84)

At 2009-10-12T04:23:44Z @MarkLodato added attachment [0016-freeze-Makefile-use-fno-strict-aliasing.patch](https://gist.github.com/d24f997ebe3f576a2b7467c6a21fda1b)

Migrated from http://trac.cython.org/ticket/402

comment_data.body:
@MarkLodato commented

Sorry about the inconsistent naming convention.  I started with .hg, but then I realized that trac wouldn't syntax highlight with that extension, so I switched to .patch.  If I could rename the files, I would.

@robertwb changed **resolution** to `fixed`
**status** from `new` to `closed`
commented

This has been merged. Thanks.

title: [with patch] update cython_freeze
